title: Demotion to bronze?
body: So I was playing my my last game in my placements and after the game it says"Congratulations summoner you have been promoted to Silver 5, Warwick's Highwayman."I haven't played any ranked games since then and it has been about 3 weeks since then I was wondering if i could play 1 game and lose then be demoted. I looked at other boards talking about this and they say that your mmr has to be a certain number for you to be demoted.** But what is that number?** Mine is 1247. **Is there a certain amount of games you have to lose to be demoted?**

replies.body:
First off, there's no way to know your true MMR. Third party sites use different algorithms to estimate your MMR, but they don't have access to that information through the Riot API like they do with match history or your Rank/League information. 

Additionally, there's no set MMR number to be demoted, and typically the system will place you where it believes you should be, based on your performance in matches. Our [Ranked Play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ) covers any details I may have missed on.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
